patthana1.3:241.1_0: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇa naadhipati naanantara nasamanantara nasahajāta naaññamañña
patthana1.3:241.1_1: nanissaya naupanissaya napurejāta napacchājāta naāsevana navipāka naāhāra naindriya najhāna namagga nasampayutta
patthana1.3:241.1_2: navippayutta noatthipaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā kamme aṭṭha.
patthana1.3:243.1_0: Yathā kusalattikassa paccanīyānulomagaṇanā sajjhāyamaggena gaṇitā, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.
